title: Mario Mandžukić
summary: Mario Mandžukić (Croatian pronunciation: [mâːrio mǎndʒukitɕ];[3] born 21 May 1986) is a Croatian football coach and a former player who played as a forward. He is currently an assistant to Zlatko Dalić in the Croatia national team. He became known for his aggressiveness, defensive contribution and aerial prowess.[4][5][6]
